Title: Pharmacological interventions for alcoholic liver disease (alcohol-related liver disease): A network meta-analysis
Abstract: © 2015 The Cochrane Collaboration.This is the protocol for a review and there is no abstract. The objectives are as follows: To assess the comparative benefits and harms of different pharmacological interventions in the management of alcohol-related liver disease through a network meta-analysis and to generate rankings of the available pharmacological interventions according to their safety and efficacy in order to identify potential treatments.
